content:
Prev: Gateway Up: Montjuïc Next: Cliff wall

Brick walls



The wall to the right of the picture is the fortress, now a military museum.
It might have been nice to see the views from the roof, but you can't get there without paying to go into the museum.
Taken Thursday, September 13, 2001, 06:34:36pm.  Original image size: 1600x1200, 875kb
Technical details: Olympus C700UZ, 1/400s @ F3.5, ISO 100, 377mm
PS6 Curves 0:0 - 90:130 - 140:150 - 200:255, B 5:0 - 255:255, USM 30:100 - 20:20 - 30:4 - 150:0.5
